name: a cat café called heaven
description:
Run a cozy little cat café during the day and rescue cat spirits at night... a dream come true

･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ☾✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ☾*:･ﾟ✧･ﾟ

Credits:
art, design - @Fabi Reichsoellner
code, design - @Jack Chateau-Loney

Music:
SoulProdMusic from Pixabay

☾✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ☽

Grow your plants and feed your fish during the day to get food and toys to rescue cats at night, but be careful to not overdo it... 
Do you ever wonder what happens to the cats you do not rescue? And why there are no café guests... is this really nothing but a dream come true?

☾✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ☽

arrow keys to move
z to interact, attract cats, and progress text
1/2 to swap cat charming item :3

controller supported~

☾✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ☽

This game was made for Mini Jam 119, with the theme Heaven and the limitation everything can die. 

･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ☾✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ✧*:･ﾟ☾*:･ﾟ✧･ﾟ
